entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
